Container.Name: UniFi Voucher Site

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 3000

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - IP Address
Config.Description: IP address of the UniFi OS Console

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - Port
Config.Description: Port of the UniFi OS Console

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - Username
Config.Description: Username for the UniFi OS Console

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - Password
Config.Description: Password for the UniFi OS Console

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - Site ID
Config.Description: Site ID for the UniFi OS Console

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - SSID
Config.Description: The UniFi SSID where guests need to connect to (Used within templating and 'Scan to Connect')

Config.Name: UniFi OS Console - SSID Password
Config.Description: The UniFi SSID WPA/WPA2/WPA3 Password (Can be ignored for 'Open' networks) (Used within templating and 'Scan to Connect')

Config.Name: Authentication - Web UI - Enable
Config.Description: Enable internal authentication for the voucher portal web UI

Config.Name: Authentication - Web UI - Password
Config.Description: Password for internal authentication for the voucher portal web UI

Config.Name: Authentication - OIDC - Enable
Config.Description: Enable OpenID Connect authentication for the voucher portal web UI

Config.Name: Authentication - OIDC - Issuer Base URL
Config.Description: OIDC issuer base url provided by oauth provider. Example: https://auth.example.com/.well-known/openid-configuration

Config.Name: Authentication - OIDC - App Base URL
Config.Description: OIDC UniFi Voucher base url (This application). Example: https://voucher.example.com

Config.Name: Authentication - OIDC - Client ID
Config.Description: OIDC client id provided by oauth provider

Config.Name: Authentication - OIDC - Client Secret
Config.Description: OIDC client secret provided by oauth provider

Config.Name: Authentication - API - Bearer Token
Config.Description: The bearer token used for the API

Config.Name: Voucher Types
Config.Description: A semi-colon-separated list of voucher types in the following format: expiration in minutes (required),single-use or multi-use vouchers value - '0' is for multi-use (unlimited) - '1' is for single-use - 'N' is for multi-use (Nx) (optional),upload speed limit in kbps (optional),download speed limit in kbps (optional),data transfer limit in MB (optional)

Config.Name: Allow Custom Voucher Types
Config.Description: Allow users to create custom vouchers types within the UI

Config.Name: Printers
Config.Description: A comma-separated list of printer formats and IPs. Example: 'pdf,192.168.1.10'

Config.Name: Email - From Address
Config.Description: The email address that will be used as the sender of the emails

Config.Name: Email - SMTP Host
Config.Description: The SMTP host to use for sending emails

Config.Name: Email - SMTP Port
Config.Description: The SMTP port to use for sending emails

Config.Name: Email - Use TLS
Config.Description: Use TLS for the SMTP connection

Config.Name: Email - SMTP Username
Config.Description: The SMTP username to use for sending emails

Config.Name: Email - SMTP Password
Config.Description: The SMTP password to use for sending emails

Config.Name: Kiosk - Enable
Config.Description: Enable/disable the kiosk page on /kiosk

Config.Name: Kiosk - Voucher Types
Config.Description: A semi-colon-separated list of voucher types in the following format: expiration in minutes (required),single-use or multi-use vouchers value - '0' is for multi-use (unlimited) - '1' is for single-use - 'N' is for multi-use (Nx) (optional),upload speed limit in kbps (optional),download speed limit in kbps (optional),data transfer limit in MB (optional)

Config.Name: Kiosk - Guest Name Required
Config.Description: Require the guest to enter their name on the kiosk page

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Log level for the application

Config.Name: Authentication - Disable
Config.Description: Disable all authentication methods

Config.Name: Enable Web UI
Config.Description: Enable the web UI

Config.Name: Enable API
Config.Description: Enable the API

Config.Name: Translation - Default Language
Config.Description: Sets the default translation for dropdowns

Config.Name: Translation - Debug
Config.Description: Enables/disables translation debugging, when enabled only translation keys are shown
